Egypt seeks to broker Gaza ceasefire as Hamas, Israel assert demandsThe U.S. said "very serious" negotiations were taking place on a new Gaza ceasefire and release of more Israeli hostages, but prospects for a deal remained uncertain as Hamas insisted it would not discuss anything less than a complete end to Israel's offensive in the Palestinian enclave. Thu, 21 Dec 2023 00:13:43 GMT ZBXBVA4PCVJJZBPC7DCWDMXFW4 https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/egypt-seeks-broker-gaza-ceasefire-hamas-israel-assert-demands-2023-12-21/Nidal Al-Mughrabi, Bassam Masoud, Dan Williams世界中东
US clemency for Saab is a boon for Maduro, critics sayVenezuela's release of 30 U.S. and domestic prisoners in exchange for freedom for a key ally of President Nicolas Maduro represents an opportunity for Maduro to bolster his political strength ahead of elections next year, analysts said. Wed, 20 Dec 2023 23:07:13 GMT ZQP26MF3SPEVKPZIZIMNBSOWM https://www.reuters.com/world/us/us-clemency-saab-is-boon-maduro-critics-say-2023-12-20/Mayela Armas世界美国
Colorado ballot case adds fuel to Trump's nomination driveThe latest legal challenge to Donald Trump's campaign for a second term as president seems likely to hand the 2024 Republican frontrunner even more firepower in his quest to win his party's nomination. Wed, 20 Dec 2023 22:28:32 GMT 7R5RYP5XJ5J4HA6PCVEGLLGX5E https://www.reuters.com/legal/colorado-ballot-case-adds-fuel-trumps-nomination-drive-2023-12-20/James Oliphant, Nandita Bose合法的
US says Hungarian sovereignty law gives 'draconian tools' to governmentA law passed in Hungary's parliament last week gives the government "draconian tools" to intimidate those with views not shared by the ruling party, the U.S. Statement Department said on Wednesday. Wed, 20 Dec 2023 22:18:12 GMT ZPGPHLFTFBLNBI3ZOFZWJ4HG54 https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/us-says-hungarian-sovereignty-law-gives-draconian-tools-government-2023-12-20/Kanishka Singh世界欧洲
Brazil Senate passes changes on corporate tax rules to boost revenueBrazil's Senate approved on Wednesday a bill to increase tax revenue by preventing companies from using corporate tax breaks granted by states to reduce taxable income for federal government coffers. Moldova to alter Soviet-era abbreviation for its airport, minister saysMoldova is to alter the three-letter international abbreviation for Chisinau airport, a government minister said on Thursday, a new bid to distance itself from its Soviet legacy and dependence on the Russian language. France prepared to change plans on 2024 Olympics opening based on securityFrance is prepared to move the 2024 Olympic opening ceremony from the River Seine to another location should the security situation require it, President Emmanuel Macron said on Wednesday. Explainer: Who is Maduro ally Alex Saab, who was granted clemency in prisoner swap?U.S. President Joe Biden has decided to grant clemency to Alex Saab, an ally of Venezuelan President Nicolas Maduro, as part of a deal in which Maduro's government released Venezuelans linked to the political opposition and 10 detained Americans. Burkina Faso detains four French civil servants, says diplomatic sourceFour French IT workers with diplomatic passports and visas have been arrested in Burkina Faso's capital, Ouagadougou, a French diplomatic source said on Wednesday, denying a media report that they were intelligence agents. Riyadh reluctant to derail Iran detente over U.S. Red Sea taskforceSaudi Arabia's name was conspicuously - perhaps surprisingly - absent from a list of countries the United States announced as part of its new naval coalition protecting Red Sea shipping from Yemen's Houthi group.
